subHeading.text: Your first 200 credits are FREE to explore and improve. Share your  feedback  and help us make the platform even better for you!

heading.title: Exams Around the Corner? We've Got You Covered!

examsAroundCorner.description: Master every topic with personalized, Ai-powered guidance and curriculum-aligned practice questions.

feedback.text: 17,643 students are using the platform to improve their learning and exam performance using Ask Ainstein platform.

profileText.name: Aamir
profileText.description: As a CFA Charterholder with over 10 years of experience tutoring thousands of students at various levels, I’ve had the privilege of witnessing remarkable transformations. I’ve seen students who once struggled in class go on to achieve extraordinary success, often surprising their parents and teachers alike.

secondPara.title: 🌟 Why I Created Ask Ainstein
secondPara.content: Drawing from my own challenges as a student with ADHD, I deeply understand what it’s like to have a short attention span and struggle with distractions. These experiences shaped my teaching style, allowing me to cater to students who learn differently. This personalized approach has been my winning formula, helping students not only succeed but thrive.
secondPara.highlight: Drawing from my own challenges as a student with ADHD

thirdPara.content: ​Now, I’ve taken this vision further by creating Ask Ainstein - a platform designed to make learning accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone.
thirdPara.highlight: a platform designed to make learning accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone.

sectionTitle.mainHeading: Are you gearing up for your school or board exams?
sectionTitle.subHeading: Need personalized attention that you are not finding outside?

functionalityData.subPara: With Ask Ainstein, you can unlock access to
functionalityData.bottomText: Don't just memorize! Get the guidance you need to excel in exams and beyond.

points.text: Gives direct answers without encouraging logical thinking.
Generic chatbot, not aligned with specific curriculums.
No integration with a structured question bank.
Acts as a tutor, helping you think critically and logically (based off 'first principles' approach).
Curriculum-aligned to meet your academic needs.
Integrated with a rich, adaptive question bank for practice.

review.reviewText: I used to score only 50-55% in math and science, and it created a lot of stress at home. My parents were always worried, and I felt stuck. This platform helped me figure out where I was making mistakes and how to fix them. After a few weeks, my score improved to 85%! My parents were so PROUD, and things at home are much better now. Even my teachers noticed the change and appreciated my hard work. I finally feel confident in my studies.

description.text: Tailored to your curriculum (starting with CBSE)
Feel free to chat or simply talk to it in Talk mode
Grading that feels human. Perfect for both short and long answers
Never too easy, never too hard. Keeps you challenged at every level
Visualize your strengths and weaknesses with clear, actionable insights
Focus on areas that need improvement for maximum impact

featureSection.subHeading: ✨ Features That Make Learning Smarter and Simpler

footerText.text: 💡 Ask Ainstein is more than a study tool – it’s your personalized guide to mastering exams and building confidence.​
footerText.highlight: it’s your personalized guide to mastering exams and building confidence.

secondReview.reviewText: My daughter was struggling with math and science, scoring only around 50-55%. It was frustrating for us because we knew she was capable but didn't know how to help her. After using this platform, we started seeing a big difference. Her understanding improved, and her scores jumped to 85%! She's more confident now. We're really proud of her progress, and I'm so glad we found this platform.
secondReview.highlight: After using this platform, we started seeing a big difference.

personalityCardData.title: Here are some famous personalities shaped by this approach

personalities.name: Elon Musk
personalities.title: Entrepreneur, CEO of Tesla and SpaceX
personalities.quote: I think it’s important to reason from first principles rather than by analogy... you boil things down to the most fundamental truths and then reason up from there.

personalities.name: Charlie Munger
personalities.title: Partner, Vice Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway
personalities.quote: You have to think about the big ideas that really work and see them coming... First principles thinking is essential to real process.

personalities.name: Steve Jobs
personalities.title: Entrepreneur, co-founder of Apple
personalities.quote: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it's worth it in the end, because once you get there, you can move mountains.

powerOfFirstPrinciple.title: The Power of First Principles Thinking
powerOfFirstPrinciple.description: Several influential thinkers, entrepreneurs, and scientists have championed first principles thinking - a problem-solving framework that breaks down complex problems into their most basic, fundamental truths.

hardTruth.highlight: HARD truth - Most schools don't teach this!

powerOfFirstPrinciple.importantStatement: It's not about what you learn.
powerOfFirstPrinciple.highlightedStatement: It's about how you think and that's what truly sets you apart in the long run.
powerOfFirstPrinciple.conclusion: By mastering this approach, you gain the tools to tackle any challenge, innovate fearlessly, and achieve lasting success.

mainHeading.text: Do you want to think like the top 1% or do you want to be like everyone else?

subHeading.text: Consistent practice with Ask Ainstein, can save you several hours and still better prepare you for your examinations.

feedback.text: 17,643 students are using the platform to improve their learning and exam performance using Ask Ainstein platform.

header.title: The 3 biggest mistakes most students make

text: Having been a student myself and coping with ADHD, I deeply understand the challenges that many face. At a young age, we are full of energy and eager to explore and express ourselves. Yet, the pressure for academic excellence, imposed by parents and society, can be overwhelming.
While we can't change the rat race, we can empower the youth of today to be better prepared for the future by helping them avoid key mistakes in their learning journey.
introduction.highlight: While we can't change the rat race, we can empower the youth of today

mistakes.title: Memorizing Answers:
mistakes.description: 🧠 Rote learning won't help you understand concepts or think critically. It will catch up to you at some point.

mistakes.title: Not Practicing Enough Problems:
mistakes.description: 📚 Without consistent practice, it's hard to identify and fill your learning gaps.

mistakes.title: Relying on Group Tuitions:
mistakes.description: 👨‍🏫 These days, most outside tuitions are conducted in groups, replicating the same challenges as a regular classroom—limited personalized attention.

quote.text: Are you falling into these traps?

footer.highlight: where learning is personalized, practice is plentiful, and understanding always comes first.
footer.closing: 💡 Avoid these mistakes with Ask Einstein - where learning is personalized, practice is plentiful, and understanding always comes first.
